title: Which IPL team has more support in all over the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: CSK is the most supportive team all over the world. Because of some excellent players of the world. The team includes MS DHONI, SURESH RAINA, DJ BRAVO, SHANE WATSON, AMBATI RAYDU. All the players are well experienced. And the fan following of MS DHONI is very high all over the world. Because there no captain as cooler to dhoni.
It's Mumbai Indians and Chennai Super Kings for there star players and CLT performances whereas Royal Challengers Bangalore is not far behind than MI & CSK
